sortingnetworksparallel

Class WorkPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • sortingnetworksparallel.WorkPool

  • public class WorkPool
extends java.lang.Object
    A Pool that when given a task will hand over the tasks to multiple threads.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WorkPool(Processor processor, short nbChannels, int innerSize, double percThreads)
      Create a workpool that can be used to assign work to a thread.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NullArray performCycle(NullArray N, short nbComp)
      Get a pruned list by Performing a generate & Prune cycle on N.
      void shutDown()
      Shut down the executor.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • WorkPool

        public WorkPool(Processor processor,
                short nbChannels,
                int innerSize,
                double percThreads)
        Create a workpool that can be used to assign work to a thread.
        Parameters:
        processor - The Processor that uses this. Methods of this Processor will be used.
        nbChannels - The amount of channels used in the network.
        innerSize - The size of the list of networks the thread will generate on.
        percThreads - The percentage (0-1) of the amount of threads obtained by Runtime#getRuntime()#availableProcessors()

    • Method Detail

      • performCycle

        public NullArray performCycle(NullArray N,
                              short nbComp)
        Get a pruned list by Performing a generate & Prune cycle on N. N will not be modified.
        Parameters:
        N - The list to perform a generate & prune cycle on.
        nbComp - One more than the amount of comparators the networks in N currently have.
        Returns:
        A pruned list.

      • shutDown

        public void shutDown()
        Shut down the executor.
